translations: n.篮板球；弹回；振作（rebound 的复数）
v.弹回；报应；重新振作（rebound 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 得到意想不到的影响；使得到报应

sentences.sentence: As the economy rebounds, the number of marriages also rises.
sentences.translation: 随着经济的复苏，结婚的人数也在增加。

sentences.sentence: Nyasia averages 11.1 points and 9 rebounds per game.
sentences.translation: 尼亚西亚在每场比赛中平均得分11.1分，9个篮板。

sentences.sentence: And my rebounds are also not bad.
